title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 147.7 - Performance advancement payments for trainees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 147.7 - Performance advancement payments for trainees

State Regulations

Notwithstanding any other provision of this Part, employees
serving in nongraded trainee positions shall be subject to performance
evaluation processes and eligible for performance advances in accordance with
the terms of plans developed by the Director of Classification and Compensation
and approved by the Director of the Budget. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
147.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
